org.apache.poi.hwpf

Class HWPFDocumentCore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.poi.POIDocument
      • org.apache.poi.hwpf.HWPFDocumentCore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HWPFDocument, HWPFOldDocument 

    public abstract class HWPFDocumentCore
extends POIDocument
    This class holds much of the core of a Word document, but without some of the table structure information. You generally want to work with one of HWPFDocument or HWPFOldDocument(此类包含Word文档的大部分核心内容，但没有一些表结构信息。您通常希望使用HWPFDocument或HWPFOldDocument之一)

        protected static final int RC4_REKEYING_INTERVAL
        [MS-DOC] 2.2.6.2/3 Office Binary Document ... Encryption: "... The block number MUST be set to zero at the beginning of the stream and MUST be incremented at each 512 byte boundary. ..."([MS-DOC] 2.2.6.2/3 Office Binary Document.加密：“.块号必须在流开始时设置为零，并且必须在每个512字节边界处增加。... ")

      • HWPFDocumentCore

        protected HWPFDocumentCore()

      • HWPFDocumentCore

        public HWPFDocumentCore(java.io.InputStream istream)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        This constructor loads a Word document from an InputStream.(此构造函数从InputStream加载Word文档。)
        Parameters:
        istream - The InputStream that contains the Word document.(istream -包含Word文档的InputStream。)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is an unexpected IOException from the passed in InputStream.(java.io. IOResponse-如果InputStream中传递的内容出现意外的IOResponse。)

      • HWPFDocumentCore

        public HWPFDocumentCore(POIFSFileSystem pfilesystem)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        This constructor loads a Word document from a POIFSFileSystem(此构造函数从POIFSFilesSystem加载Word文档)
        Parameters:
        pfilesystem - The POIFSFileSystem that contains the Word document.(pfilesystem -包含Word文档的POIFSFileSystem。)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is an unexpected IOException from the passed in POIFSFileSystem.(IOException -如果POIFSFileSystem中传递了一个意外的IOException。)

      • HWPFDocumentCore

        public HWPFDocumentCore(DirectoryNode directory)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        This constructor loads a Word document from a specific point in a POIFSFileSystem, probably not the default. Used typically to open embeded documents.(此构造函数从POIFSFileSystem中的特定点加载Word文档，可能不是默认值。通常用于打开嵌入的文档。)
        Parameters:
        directory - The DirectoryNode that contains the Word document.(目录-包含Word文档的Directory节点。)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is an unexpected IOException from the passed in POIFSFileSystem.(IOException -如果POIFSFileSystem中传递了一个意外的IOException。)

      • getEncryptionInfo

        public EncryptionInfo getEncryptionInfo()
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Overrides:
        getEncryptionInfo in class POIDocument
        Returns:
        the encryption info if the document is encrypted, otherwise null(如果文档已加密，则为加密信息，否则为空)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If retrieving the encryption information fails(java.io. IOResponse-如果检索加密信息失败)

      • updateEncryptionInfo

        protected void updateEncryptionInfo()

      • getDocumentEntryBytes

        protected byte[] getDocumentEntryBytes(java.lang.String name,
                                       int encryptionOffset,
                                       int len)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Reads OLE Stream into byte array - if an EncryptionInfo is available, decrypt the bytes starting at encryptionOffset. If encryptionOffset = -1, then do not try to decrypt the bytes(将PLE Stream读取到字节数组中-如果SecureInfo可用，请解密从DelivertionOffset开始的字节。如果AcctionOffset =-1，则不要尝试解密字节)
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the stream(名称-流的名称)
        encryptionOffset - the offset from which to start decrypting, use -1 for no decryption(RecommendOffset-开始解密的偏置，使用-1表示不解密)
        len - length of the bytes to be read, use Integer.MAX_VALUE for all bytes(len -要读取的字节的长度，对所有字节使用RST.MAX_UTE)
        Returns:
        the read bytes(读取的字节)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the stream can't be found(java.io. IOResponse-如果找不到流)
